about_the_game:
This is DLC of Mai for VR Harem Sex!!!

Purchasing this DLC adds a new character, Mai, to VR Harem Sex.


An immersive VR harem experience!

we have achieved an overwhelming number of functions and flexibility!

Harem sex + lesbian play
8(+DLC) girls to summon!
You can also make the girls play with each other!


An overwhelming degree of freedom
Many features, especially the one that lets you have the girls play with each other's bodies, provide an overwhelming degree of freedom!
Sex in any position, lesbian play, and even lesbian play from a first-person perspective!


Hip thrusts, blowjobs, and titty fucks that sync up with your hands!
The girls follow the movements of your hand (controller) as they bounce their asses, and give blowjobs and titty fucks!
With hand tracking, the girl will move in sync with you as you masturbate!


Change breast size freely!
You can freely select the breast size of each girl!
From itty bitty titties to big mommy milkers, choose whatever you like!

content_descriptors.notes:

It does NOT include depictions of alcohol abuse, violence, self-harm, or suicide.
